text: (visesavagi) a nirdista dinagalalli nivu allahanannu smarisiri. Yaradaru avasarapattu erade dinagalalli (hajjâ€Œninda) teralidare avara mele papavenilla. Hageye, tusu vilambisidavana melu papavenilla. Idu dharmanistharigagi (iruva niyama). Nivu allahanige anjiri mattu nimage tilidirali, ondu dina nim'mellarannu avana munde serisalaguvudu
